author: Amir Ismael
title: How to lace up your sneakers 3 different ways for unique looks — a step-by-step guide
description: Sneakers are integral to casual style, but whether you realize it or not, how you lace your sneakers can hurt or enhance the overall look of your outfit. By paying close attention to how they're laced, you can add a unique flair to your personal style or simp…
